Description: Mummy of a young baboon, in a sitting position, wrapped in linen bandages, the bandages are missing in several places and reveal the fur beneath, the surviving bandages are encrusted with a soil-like deposit.
Curator's comments: Published in: N.J. Dominy et al., Mummified baboons reveal the far reach of early Egyptian mariners, eLife 2020;9:e60860
